alert.note: Alert for Pembina (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 17 at 11:39AM CDT until April 21 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Dakota... Pembina River at Neche affecting Pembina County. .Ice jamming along the Pembina River near Neche is causing rises along the river. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pembina River at Neche. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. Residential damage begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM CDT Monday the stage was 17.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 19.2 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
